name: Yurii Kolesnykov
body:
**Location:** Kyiv, Ukraine  
**Born:** 1988  
**Email:** yurii@kolesnykov.com  
**Skype:** yurikoles  
**LinkedIn:** http://yurikoles.com  
**Mobile:** +380919768808  
**This CV:** http://kolesnykov.com  
# Objective: 
iOS Software Engineer position in company with own products. 
# Key skills:
* 3 years of commercial iOS Development experience.  
* Developed iPhone clients for 2 social networks.  
* Developed outsource projects as well as internal projects.  
* Supported a number of third-party of different scale.  

# Buzzwords:
Objective-C, Xсode, UIKit (Cocoa Touch),  Core Data, KVO, KVC, Blocks, JSON, XML, Apple MapKit, Yandex MapKit, Quartz core graphics, Core Animation, Core Location, SQLite Facebook, Git, SVN (Subversion), Jira, Redmine, iTunes Connect (app publishing); Ruby, Rails,  RubyMine.  

# Experience:
* **Singularex**, Kharkiv, http://singularex.com/ 
 * July 2014 – December 2014, Senior  iOS Software Engineer
Prepared for release Atracx project, passive and active indoor navigation software system which determine location of customers in large shopping malls. Based on this, customer located in shopping mall receive various services offers.
 * Developed PinPark, an app for saving location of parking and finding it later.

* **Biruza Software**, Donetsk, http://www.biruza.com  
August 2013 – July 2014, Middle iOS Software Engineer  
Developed social network app, in which user share their shopping experience, Bestie project (http://www.bestie.com/).  

* **Go interactive!**, Kyiv http://gointeractive.com.ua/  
June 2012 – March 2013, Middle iOS Software Engineer  
Developed UI, networking and DB parts, map for the social network with geopositioning function application, Fourcoins project.  

* **GrandSoftStudio**, Donetsk, http://grandsoftstudio.com   
June 2011 – March 2012, Junior iOS Software Engineer  
 * Prepared for release and supported iPhone and iPad applications.   
 * Fixed bugs in the UI and logic.  
 * Extended functionality of applications as well as the UI and the logic of applications.  
 * Projects: Le Bled, BIVB  

# Education:  
Donetsk National Technical University (2005 – 2009),  
Faculty of Computer Engineering and Informatics. Dropped.
  
# Level of English  
I Can participate in IT-related conversations.  

# iOS Projects:  
* **PinPark App**  
Application for saving place where you have parked your car and to find it later.  
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/pinpark-app/id945859658  
* **Bestie App**  
Social network build around shopping   
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/bestie-app/id88626571  
* **Fourcoins**
Social network with geopositioning function
https://itunes.apple.com/ua/app/fourcoins/id628075534
* **Go Problems**
2D game on a large set of game field situations 
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/go-problems/id635778548
* **Le Bled**  
Application for learning French  
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/le-bled-orthographe-grammaire/id444078131   
* **BIVB**  
Calculator for winemakers  
https://itunes.apple.com/fr/app/calculateurs-techniques-bivb/id485272472  

# Ruby projects:  
* http://www.rubyriders.com/    
sources: https://github.com/rubyridersllc/website
